activities: CustomerNation uses personal information to provide product registration services to manufacturers that subscribe to CustomerNation's product registration services.  Information gathered at CustomerNation permits consumers to register products easily and enables communication with our subscribing manufacturers.  When registering a product with a certain manufacturer, whatever a consumer submits in his or her registration is what will be given to the manufacturer for that registration.  A person's personal information will never be shared with a manufacturer unless they choose to submit a registration to that manufacturer.  Under no circumstances does CustomerNation share personal information with any 3rd Party without the consumer's explicit permission.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We comply to private sector developed privacy programs that incorporate the Safe Harbor Principles and that include effective enforcement mechanisms.  Complaints can be made at our company web site or to TRUSTe's EU Safe Harbor Program.
